statements: UPDATE meta_tags SET page_url = '/about-us', description = 'About us page' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE meta_tags SET description = 'Home page' WHERE page_url = '/'
UPDATE meta_tags SET meta_tags = '{"keywords": "database, schema", "author": "John Doe"}', description = 'This is a sample meta description' WHERE id = 1

UPDATE meta_tags SET page_url = 'http://www.example.com/page-2', meta_tags = '{"keywords": "example, page", "author": "Jane Smith"}', description = 'Another sample description' WHERE page_url = 'http://www.example.com/page-2'
UPDATE meta_tags SET tag_name = 'title', tag_content = 'Home Page Title' WHERE page_id = 1;
UPDATE page_descriptions SET page_url = '/home', description = 'This is the home page' WHERE page_id = 1;
UPDATE meta_tags SET tag_name='Updated Tag', tag_content='New Content' WHERE page_id=1;

UPDATE page_descriptions SET description='Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nullam finibus tortor eu consequat imperdiet. Pellentesque varius augue eget ligula ornare, vel mollis sapien molestie. Vestibulum feugiat justo eget est. Sed feugiat ac nisi ut hendrerit. Integer eget efficitur mi, eget cursus orci. Maecenas posuere volutpat augue, eu feugiat ipsum finibus eu. Mauris egestas tellus eu sollicitudin auctor. Morbi in nunc ac enim vehicula ultricies. Vestibulum in quam dui. Nam vehicula arcu vitae mi malesuada, a ultrices felis euismod. Mauris sed scelerisque odio, eget ullamcorper lorem. Nam turpis est, aliquet vel tempor et, placerat quis turpis.' WHERE page_id=2;
UPDATE MetaTags SET meta_title = 'Homepage Title', meta_description = 'Homepage Description' WHERE page_id = 1;
UPDATE PageDescriptions SET full_description = 'Welcome to the homepage' WHERE page_id = 1;
UPDATE MetaTags SET meta_title = 'New Title 1', meta_description = 'New Description 1' WHERE page_id = 1;
UPDATE PageDescriptions SET full_description = 'Updated Full Description 2', page_title = 'Updated Page Title 2' WHERE page_id = 2;
UPDATE meta_tags SET meta_keywords = 'SEO', description = 'SEO best practices' WHERE page_id = 1;
UPDATE page_info SET title = 'Homepage', page_url = '/home' WHERE page_id = 1;
UPDATE meta_tags SET meta_keywords='database, schema', description='New schema for tables' WHERE page_id=1;
UPDATE page_info SET title='Example Schema', page_url='example.com/schema' WHERE page_id=2;
UPDATE meta_tags SET title = 'New Title', keywords = 'New Keywords' WHERE page_url = 'http://example.com/page1'
UPDATE page_combinations SET category_id = '63e2c4f7-74bb-4b83-969b-21fdd8f6fc19' WHERE page_url = 'http://example.com/page2'
UPDATE meta_tags SET keywords='SEO, SEM, Marketing' WHERE page_url='https://www.example.com'
UPDATE page_categories SET category_name='Technology' WHERE category_id='f782ebf9-6dcb-4e21-aeea-7233ee25567f'
